item.title: 2030 Summary
item.description: Intro Computation parameters üåè‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡•á‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ‡•ç (‡§á‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞-‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§É) Basic parameters lunar_month_assigner_type = "MULTI_FULL_MOON_SIDEREAL_MONTH_ADHIKA" ayanaamsha_id = "CHITRA_AT_180" jsonClass = "ComputationSystem" [graha_lopa_measures] jsonClass = "GrahaLopaMeasures" [graha_lopa_measures.graha_id_to_lopa_measure] jupiter = 11 venus = 9 mercury = 13 mars = 17 saturn = 15 Event options aparaahna_as_second_half = false no_fests = true tropical_month_start = "mAdhava_at_equinox" fest_repos_excluded_patterns = [ ".*viSuvAdi.*",] prefer_eight_fold_day_division = false julian_handling = "converted to Gregorian" jsonClass = "FestivalOptions" Repos: devatA/gaNapati, devatA/graha, devatA/kaumAra, devatA/lakShmI, devatA/misc-fauna, devatA/misc-flora, devatA/nadI, devatA/pitR, devatA/shaiva, devatA/shakti, devatA/devIparva, devatA/dashamahAvidyA, devatA/umA, devatA/vaiShNava, gRhya/Apastamba, gRhya/Apastamba_seasonal, gRhya/general, general, mahApuruSha/ALvAr, mahApuruSha/RShi, mahApuruSha/general-indic-non-tropical, mahApuruSha/kAnchI-maTha, mahApuruSha/general-indic-tropical, mahApuruSha/sci-tech, mahApuruSha/zRGgErI-maTha, mahApuruSha/mAdhva-misc, mahApuruSha/nAyanmAr, mahApuruSha/sangIta-kRt, mahApuruSha/smArta-misc, mahApuruSha/vaiShNava-misc, mahApuruSha/xatra, mahApuruSha/xatra-later, tamil, temples/Andhra, temples/Kerala, temples/North, temples/Odisha, temples/Tamil, temples/venkaTAchala, time_focus/Eclipses, time_focus/amrita-siddhi, time_focus/nakta-vrata-yoga, time_focus/Rtu/tropical-ayanAdi, time_focus/luno-tropical/smArta, time_focus/misc, time_focus/misc_combinations, time_focus/special-tithis, time_focus/tithi-vara-combinations, time_focus/monthly/amAvAsyA, time_focus/monthly/dvAdashI, time_focus/monthly/ekAdashI, time_focus/monthly/pradoSha, time_focus/nakShatra, time_focus/puShkara, time_focus/sankrAnti, time_focus/yugAdiH, time_focus/kalpAdiH, time_focus/adhyayana, time_focus/manvAdiH Table
